actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Coast Guard cutter Chautaqua to be made available for use as an exhibition and education center under contracts with nonprofit organizations.

summary.text: Authorizes the Commandant of the Coast Guard to enter into a contract with the Boston Educational Marine Exchange or any other private or public nonprofit organization to utilize the Coast Guard cutter Chautaque for the purposes of establishing an exhibit to educate the public regarding the mission of the Coast Guard and to use space and facilities abroad the vessel for marine education activities.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Coast Guard cutter Chautaqua to be made available for use as an exhibition and education center under contracts with nonprofit organizations.
